job.title: Full Stack Developer - Build the Backbone of a Fitness Revolution
job.description:
We're seeking a highly skilled Full Stack Developer to join our team and build the core functionalities that will power our client experience.
The Project:
We're moving away from clunky paper systems and embracing the future of fitness management. You'll be the architect, building a secure and scalable web application that handles everything from client accounts to fitness tracking.
Responsibilities:
Front-End Development:
Collaborate with designers to translate UI mockups into a user-friendly and responsive web interface.
Implement interactive features for client account management (signup, login, membership management).
Develop functionality for booking classes, viewing instructor details, and managing schedules.
Back-End Development:
Design and build a secure and scalable back-end system using robust technologies (e.g., Node.js, Python, Django).
Implement secure user authentication and authorization to manage client data.
Develop APIs to connect the web app with existing payment gateways and scheduling platforms (if applicable).
Integrate with fitness tracking devices or APIs (if applicable) to facilitate workout tracking.
Full Stack Expertise:
Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code to ensure application stability and performance.
Implement unit and integration tests to guarantee code quality and functionality.
Stay up-to-date with the latest web development trends and technologies.
We're looking for a freelancer who:
Has a minimum of 3 years experience as a Full Stack Developer.
Possesses a strong understanding of both front-end and back-end development principles.
Is proficient in modern frameworks and libraries (e.g., React, Angular, Node.js).
Thrives in a collaborative environment and enjoys working with passionate teams.
Can manage their time effectively and meet deadlines.
Bonus points for:
Experience with building secure and scalable web applications.
Familiarity with fitness or health-related APIs or data structures.
A portfolio showcasing your full-stack development capabilities.

Ready to Code the Future of Fitness?
If you're a talented Full Stack Developer who loves a coding challenge and wants to make a real impact, we want to hear from you! Submit your Upwork profile link, portfolio (if applicable), and a cover letter explaining your experience and why you'd be a perfect fit for this project. Let's build something revolutionary together!

questions.question: Describe your recent experience with similar projects
Please list any certifications related to this project
Include a link to your GitHub profile and/or website
What frameworks have you worked with?

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a talented Full Stack Developer to join our team and help us build the backbone of a fitness revolution. This is a long-term project with a duration of more than 6 months. As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our fitness app using React Native, CSS, Node.js, JavaScript, and Angular.

To be successful in this role, you should have experience in developing mobile applications using React Native and have a strong understanding of front-end and back-end technologies. You should also be familiar with Agile methodologies and have excellent problem-solving skills.

To apply for this position, please submit a proposal detailing how you can contribute to this project. We would like to see examples of your past completed projects, so please include links to your portfolio or relevant work samples. We look forward to reviewing your application and discussing the project further with you.
